Simplified in your browser 简体字的浏览器显示:巡

Simplified in Unicode standard 简体字的Unicode标准:U+5DE1

Main pronunciation 主要发音: xún

Other pronunciations 其它发音: xún,yán,shùn

Original meaning 本义: Meaning to patrol.

English senses 英语理解: patrol, go on circuit, cruise

Usage example 用法举例: 巡邏 xún luó (go on patrol)

Importance by frequency 常用频率: 1225

Shuowen 说文解字: 延行貌從辵川聲

Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Compound 廵 older 巡 from (rem- 廴 yǐn) from road-and-foot 辶辶辵 chuò and phonetic river 巛川 chuān C658 巡<廵> simp 巡.

廵字的基本解释

廵
xún
同“巡”。

廵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xún］
［《廣韻》詳遵切，平諄，邪。］
亦作“廵1”。“遁3”的被通假字。
(1)巡阅；巡行。
(2)引申指审视，细看。
(3)巡视安抚；抚慰。
(4)逐个，依次。
(5)指依次斟饮。
(6)量词。遍；顿。
[②]［yán］
［《集韻》余專切，平，以。］
亦作“廵2”。
(1)随；衔接。
(2)沿着，顺着。

廵字的康熙字典解释

【備考】【寅集】【廴字部】　廵； 康熙笔画：6； 页码：页352第29
【字彙補】巡字之譌。

Basic explanation of words
廵
xún
Same as "patrol".
廵
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xún］
["Guangyun" follows the cut in detail, flat and honest, evil. ]
Also known as "廵1". "Escape 3" has been passed falsely.
(1) Patrolling; patrolling.
(2) By extension, it means to examine and look closely.
(3) Inspection and comfort; comfort.
(4) One by one, one by one.
(5) Refers to pouring one by one.
(6) Quantifiers. Times; pause.
[②]［yán］
["Ji Yun" Yu Zhuan cut, level , to. ]
Also known as "廵2".
(1) With; convergence.
(2) Follow along, follow along.
